activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3886
activity.text:
### Date: April 15, 2025  

#### Current Status:  
- Created a dedicated Postman collection to test all combinations of multiple search criteria.  
- Performed thorough QA validation across all DEG domains for price, tag, provider, item, and location filters.  
- Identified and fixed issues related to inconsistent filter behavior and incorrect query mappings.  
- Enhanced existing search code to improve response accuracy and handle edge cases more gracefully.  
- Added validations and logging to improve debuggability and maintainability of the search feature.

Postman collection:

[Beckn Search PS.postman_collection.json](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/19770580/Beckn.Search.PS.postman_collection.json)

Supported search table:

### Search Filter Support Across Domains

| Domain         | Search by Provider Name | Search by Item Name | Search by Price                      | Search by Location                                       | Search by Tags |
|----------------|--------------------------|----------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------|----------------|
| deg:ev         | Yes                      | Yes                  | Yes                                  | Yes                                                      | Yes            |
| deg:retail     | Yes                      | Yes                  | Yes                                  | Yes                                                      | Yes            |
| deg:rental     | Yes                      | Yes                  | Yes                                  | Yes                                                      | Yes            |
| deg:finance    | Yes                      | Yes                  | No (price does not exist for finance)| Yes                                                      | Yes            |
| uei:p2p_trading| Yes                      | Yes                  | Yes                                  | No (Fulfillment search does not consider geo location)   | Yes            |

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3885
activity.text:
### Date: April 15, 2025  

#### Current Status:  
- Reviewed the existing codebase to identify the currently implemented search filters.  
- Implemented and updated logic for filters based on price, tag, provider, item, and location. 
- Fixed the existing issues like invalid beckn format for search, select, init, confirm api
- Tested the updated search flow across all DEG domains and resolved any issues found.  
- Optimized query structure to ensure better performance and accuracy in filtered results.  
- Updated API request/response structure to reflect the newly added search criteria.  
- Validated compatibility of changes with existing BPP endpoints and ensured backward support.

PR: https://github.com/beckn/strapi-plugins/pull/262

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3551
activity.text:
### Date: April 11, 2025  

#### Current Status:  
- Attempted to fetch GitHub Projects data using the project board ID.  
- Faced permission issues with the auto-generated GitHub token in GitHub Actions.  
- Tried using personal project data but was still unable to fetch project information.  
- Cannot add the required token as a GitHub secret due to lack of permissions.  

#### Next Step:  
- A maintainer needs to add a GitHub token with the necessary permissions as a secret variable.  
- Re-test the functionality once the token is available.

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3549
activity.text:
### Date: April 11, 2025  

#### Current Status:  
- Faced a blocker related to Slack token and GitHub permissions.  
- Required Slack token to be added as a secret in GitHub, but do not have maintainer access to do so.  
- Attempted using a personal Slack token by hardcoding it in the GitHub Actions file, but Slack invalidated it since the repository is public.  

#### Next Step:  
- A maintainer needs to add the Slack token with the necessary permissions as a GitHub secret.  
- Re-test the integration once the token is added.  

@viraj89 @emmayank

activity.title: beckn/beckn-utilities#346
activity.text:
### Date: April 2, 2025  

#### Current Status:  
- Created Node.js scripts to fetch all Strapi data using REST API.  
- Faced issues with data population in the `provider` table while using REST API.  
- Tried multiple solutions to resolve the population issue but was unsuccessful.  
- Moved the scripts inside the Strapi application and used the Entity Service API to successfully fetch the required data.  

#### Next Step:  
- Test and validate the fetched data for accuracy and completeness.  


[allProviders.json](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/19705601/allProviders.json)

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3448
activity.text:
### Date: March 27, 2025  

#### Current Status:  
- Took a backup of the dev database before making changes.  
- Performed pre-deployment efforts on the dev environment, including cleaning existing data to add `base_fee` and removing outdated price breakups.  
- Deployed the application on the dev environment in a separate branch.  
- Conducted post-deployment tasks such as adding price breakups and ensuring the total price is calculated dynamically.  
- Tested the deployed code thoroughly and fixed any issues that arose during testing.  
- Implemented dynamic price calculation and retrieval of `base_fee` names across `on_init`, `on_confirm`, and `on_status` API calls.  
- Collaborated with Aniket to test the complete end-to-end flow.  

#### Next Step:  
- Fix the issues raised by QA on the dev environment.
